cards.name: A Clash of Kings
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, move 1 power from the losing opponent's faction card to your own.

cards.name: A Feast for Crows
cards.text: Reaction: After you win dominance, gain 2 power for your faction.

cards.name: A Game of Thrones
cards.text: A player cannot initiate a [military] or [power] challenge unless he or she has won an [intrigue] challenge that phase.

cards.name: A Noble Cause
cards.text: Reduce the cost of the first Lord or Lady character you marshal this round by 2.

cards.name: A Storm of Swords
cards.text: You may initiate an additional [military] challenge during the challenges phase.

cards.name: Building Orders
cards.text: When Revealed: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for an attachment or a location, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Calling the Banners
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose an opponent. Gain 1 gold for each character that player controls.

cards.name: Calm Over Westeros
cards.text: When Revealed: Name a challenge type. Until you reveal a new plot card, reduce the claim value on the attacking player's revealed plot card by 1 during challenges of that type in which you are the defending player.

cards.name: Confiscation
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose an attachment, and discard it from play.

cards.name: Counting Coppers
cards.text: When Revealed: Draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Filthy Accusations
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose and kneel a character.

cards.name: Fortified Position
cards.text: Treat each character as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).

cards.name: Heads on Spikes
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose an opponent. Discard 1 card at random from that player's hand. If that card is a character, gain 2 power for your faction and place the discarded character in its owner's dead pile.

cards.name: Jousting Contest
cards.text: Each player cannot declare more than 1 character as an attacker or defender in each challenge.

cards.name: Marched to the Wall
cards.text: When Revealed: Each player chooses a character he or she controls (if able), and discards it from play (cannot be saved).

cards.name: Marching Orders
cards.text: You cannot marshal locations or attachments, or play events.

cards.name: Naval Superiority
cards.text: Treat the base gold value on each revealed Kingdom and each revealed Edict plot card as if it were 0.

cards.name: Power Behind the Throne
cards.text: When Revealed: Place 1 stand token on Power Behind the Throne. Action: Discard 1 stand token from Power Behind the Throne to choose and stand a character.

cards.name: Rebuilding
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose up to 3 cards in your discard pile, and shuffle them into your deck.

cards.name: Reinforcements
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose a character with printed cost 5 or lower in your hand or discard pile, and put it into play.

cards.name: Sneak Attack
cards.text: You cannot initiate more than 1 challenge during the challenges phase.

cards.name: Summons
cards.text: When Revealed: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for a character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Supporting the Faith
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, each player returns all gold in his or her gold pool to the treasury.

cards.name: Taxation
cards.text: You may marshal or play 1 additional limited card this round.

cards.name: The Winds of Winter
cards.flavor: A cold wind was blowing out of the north, and it made the trees rustle like living things. All day, Will had felt as though something were watching him, something cold and implacable that loved him not.

cards.name: Wildfire Assault
cards.text: When Revealed: Each player chooses up to 3 characters he or she controls. Kill each character not chosen (cannot be saved).

cards.name: Fealty
cards.text: You cannot include more than 15 neutral cards in your deck. Action: Kneel your faction card to reduce the cost of the next loyal card you marshal or play this phase by 1.

cards.name: Littlefinger
cards.text: Reaction: After you marshal Littlefinger, draw 2 cards. +1 Income.
cards.flavor: "I did warn you not to trust me."

cards.name: Varys
cards.text: Stealth. Interrupt: When the dominance phase ends, remove Varys from the game to discard each character from play.
cards.flavor: "Why is it always the innocents who suffer most, when you high lords play your game of thrones?"

cards.name: Rattleshirt's Raiders
cards.text: No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Rattleshirt's Raiders is participating as an attacker, choose an attachment controlled by the losing opponent, and discard it from play.

cards.name: Wildling Horde
cards.text: No attachments. Pillage. Challenges Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a participating Wildling character you control. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR.

cards.name: Seal of the Hand
cards.text: Lord or Lady character only. Action: Kneel Seal of the Hand to stand attached character.
cards.flavor: "The king eats, they say, and the Hand takes the shit." <cite>Robert Baratheon</cite>

cards.name: Bodyguard
cards.text: Lord or Lady character only. Interrupt: When attached character would be killed or discarded from play, sacrifice Bodyguard to save that character.

cards.name: Little Bird
cards.text: Attached character gains an [intrigue] icon.
cards.flavor: "He has informants everywhere. His little birds, he calls them." <cite>Littlefinger</cite>

cards.name: Milk of the Poppy
cards.text: Terminal. Treat attached character's printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits).
cards.flavor: By the time the maester removed the funnel from his mouth, he was already spiralling back to sleep.

cards.name: Noble Lineage
cards.text: Attached character gains a [power] icon.
cards.flavor: What had Jon Arryn wanted with a king's bastard, and why was it worth his life?

cards.name: Syrio's Training
cards.text: Attached character gains a [military] icon.
cards.flavor: "Now we will begin the dance." <cite>Syrio Forel</cite>

cards.name: The Iron Throne
cards.text:
The Iron Throne contributes 8 STR to your total for dominance.
+1 Reserve.
cards.flavor: "…it is a monstruous uncomfortable chair. In more ways than one." <cite>Robert Baratheon</cite>

cards.name: The Kingsroad
cards.text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel and sacrifice The Kingsroad to reduce the cost of the next character you marshal this phase by 3. +1 Initiative.

cards.name: The Roseroad
cards.text:
Limited.
+1 Income.

cards.name: Put to the Sword
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge by 5 or more STR as the attacking player, choose and kill a character controlled by the losing opponent. (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: Put to the Torch
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge by 5 or more STR as the attacking player, choose a location controlled by the losing opponent, and discard it from play. (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: Superior Claim
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge by 5 or more STR, gain 2 power for your faction. (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: Tears of Lys
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge as the attacking player, place a poison token on a character without an [intrigue] icon controlled by the losing opponent. At the end of the phase, if that character still has the poison token, remove it and kill that character. (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: The Hand's Judgment
cards.text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's event would initiate, cancel those effects. X is that event's printed cost.

cards.name: Maester Cressen
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Maester Cressen to choose a Condition attachment, and discard it from play.

cards.name: Melisandre
cards.text: Reaction: After you marshal or play a R'hllor card, choose and kneel a character. (Limit once per round.)
cards.flavor: "It is not the foes who curse you to your face that you must fear, but those who smile when you are looking and sharpen their knives when you turn your back."

cards.name: Robert Baratheon
cards.text:
Intimidate. Renown.
Robert Baratheon gets +1 STR for each other kneeling character in play.
cards.flavor: "Fat? Fat, is it? Is that how your speak to your king? Ah, damn you, Ned, why are you always right?"

cards.name: Selyse Baratheon
cards.text: Challenges Action: Pay 1 gold to choose a [baratheon] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an [intrigue] icon.

cards.name: Ser Davos Seaworth
cards.text: Stealth. Interrupt: When Ser Davos Seaworth is killed, return him to your hand instead of placing him in your dead pile.
cards.flavor: "King Stannis is my god. He made me and blessed me with his trust."

cards.name: Shireen Baratheon
cards.text: Interrupt: When Shireen Baratheon is killed, choose and kneel a character.
cards.flavor: "The grey death sleeps, only to wake again. The child is not clean!" <cite>Val</cite>

cards.name: Stannis Baratheon
cards.text: Each player cannot stand more than 2 characters during the standing phase.
cards.flavor: "I shall bring justice to Westeros."

cards.name: Bastard in Hiding
cards.flavor: "The seed is strong, he told me. His last words. He kept saying Robert's name, and he grabbed my arm so hard he left marks. Tell them, the seed is strong." <cite>Lysa Arryn</cite>

cards.name: Fiery Followers
cards.text: Reaction: After the dominance phase begins, stand Fiery Followers.
cards.flavor: "The red priests have a great temple on Lys. Always they are burning this and burning that, crying out to their R'hllor. They bore me with their fires. Soon they will bore King Stannis too, it is to be hoped." <cite>Salladhor Saan</cite>

cards.name: King's Hunting Party
cards.text: No attachments. While an opponent controls a King character, King's Hunting Party gains an [intrigue] icon .
cards.flavor: "Three of my men were cut down like dogs not a league from where we sit, and what does Robert do? He goes hunting." <cite>Eddard Stark</cite>

cards.name: Dragonstone Faithful
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Dragonstone Faithful to reduce the cost of the next [baratheon] character you marshal this phase by 1.

cards.name: Vanguard Lancer
cards.text: Reaction: After Vanguard Lancer enters play, choose an opponent's character or faction card, and discard 1 power from that card.

cards.name: Lightbringer
cards.text: [baratheon] character only. If attached character is Stannis Baratheon, he gains renown. Reaction: After attached character gains 1 or more power, stand it. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Dragonstone Port
cards.text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Dragonstone Port to reduce the cost of the next [baratheon] card you marshal this phase by 1.

cards.name: Chamber of the Painted Table
cards.text: Reaction: After you win dominance, kneel Chamber of the Painted Table to move 1 power from an opponent's faction card to your own.

cards.name: The Red Keep
cards.text: The Red Keep contributes 2 STR to your side during any [power] challenge in which you control a participating character. Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you have not lost a [power] challenge this round, kneel The Red Keep to draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Consolidation of Power
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Choose and kneel up to 4 total STR worth of characters controlled by the same player. Then, choose one of those characters, and have it gain 1 power.

cards.name: Ours is the Fury
cards.text: Play only during a challenge in which you are the defending player. Action: Choose a kneeling [baratheon] character you control. That character is now participating as a defender. If you win this challenge, stand that character.

cards.name: Seen In Flames
cards.text: Play only if you control a R'hllor character. Challenges Action: Choose an opponent, and look at his or her hand. Then, choose and discard 1 card from that hand.

cards.name: Aeron Damphair
cards.text: Reaction: After you win dominance, put an Ironborn character into play from your dead pile.
cards.flavor: "What is dead may never die, but rises again, harder and stronger."

cards.name: Alannys Greyjoy
cards.text: While you are the first player, reduce the reserve value on each opponent's revealed plot card by 1.
cards.flavor: Alannys never had the sort of beauty the singers cherished, but her daughter had loved her fierce strong face and the laughter in her eyes.

cards.name: Asha Greyjoy
cards.text: Stealth. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge in which Asha Greyjoy is participating, stand her.
cards.flavor: "I am Asha of House Greyjoy, aye. Opinions differ on whether I'm a lady."

cards.name: Balon Greyjoy
cards.text:
Renown.
While Balon Greyjoy is attacking, each defending character with a lower STR than his does not contribute its STR to that challenge.
cards.flavor: "I am the Greyjoy, Lord Reaper of Pyke, King of Salt and Rock, Son of the Sea Wind, and no man gives me a crown. I pay the iron price."

cards.name: Euron Crow's Eye
cards.text: Pillage. Renown. Reaction: After Euron Crow's Eye discards a card using pillage, put a location from the losing opponent's discard pile into play under your control.
cards.flavor: "The Crow's Eye worships naught but his own pride." <cite>Aeron Damphair</cite>

cards.name: Maester Wendamyr
cards.text: Stealth.
cards.flavor: He wore about his neck a chain of many metals that marked him for a master of the Citadel.

cards.name: Theon Greyjoy
cards.text: Stealth. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge in which Theon Greyjoy is participating, he gains 1 power.
cards.flavor: "Only a fool humbles himself when the world is so full of men eager to do that job for him."

cards.name: Black Wind's Crew
cards.text: Pillage.

cards.name: Drowned Men
cards.text: No attachments. Drowned Men gets +1 STR for each Warship location you control.

cards.name: Iron Islands Fishmonger
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Iron Islands Fishmonger to reduce the cost of the next [greyjoy] character you marshal this phase by 1.

cards.name: Lordsport Shipwright
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Lordsport Shipwright to choose and kneel a location with printed cost 2 or lower. (Printed cost 3 or lower instead if you are the first player.)

cards.name: Salty Navigator
cards.text: +1 Initiative.
cards.flavor: "No man ever truly knows what he can do unless he dares to leap." <cite>Euron Crow's Eye</cite>

cards.name: Throwing Axe
cards.text: Ironborn character only. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is participating as an attacker, sacrifice Throwing Axe to choose and kill a defending character.

cards.name: Great Kraken
cards.text: While you control Balon Greyjoy, he gains stealth. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, either: draw 1 card, or gain 1 power for your faction. (Limit twice per round.)

cards.name: Iron Fleet Scout
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kneel Iron Fleet Scout to choose a participating [greyjoy] character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +1 STR. (+2 STR instead if you are the first player.)

cards.name: Sea Tower
cards.text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Sea Tower to reduce the cost of the next [greyjoy] card you marshal this phase by 1.

cards.name: Risen from the Sea
cards.text: Interrupt: When a [greyjoy] character would be killed, save it. Then, attach Risen from the Sea to that character as a Condition attachment with the text: "Terminal. Attached character gets +1 STR."

cards.name: The Kraken's Grasp
cards.text: Play only if you are the first player. Challenges Action: Choose a defending character with STR 5 or lower. That character does not contribute is STR to this challenge.

cards.name: We Do Not Sow
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, choose an attachment or location controlled by the losing opponent, and discard it from play. (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: Cersei Lannister
cards.text: While Cersei Lannister is attacking during an [intrigue] challenge, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.
cards.flavor: "Love is poison. A sweet poison, but it will kill you all the same."

cards.name: Grand Maester Pycelle
cards.text: Insight.
cards.flavor: "All I did, I did for House Lannister."

cards.name: Joffrey Baratheon
cards.text: Reaction: After a Lord or Lady character is killed, Joffrey Baratheon gains 1 power. (Limit 3 times per round.)
cards.flavor: "My son. How could I have made a son like that, Ned?" <cite>Robert Baratheon</cite>

cards.name: Ser Jaime Lannister
cards.text: Ser Jaime Lannister does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [military] challenge, and gains renown while participating in a [military] challenge.
cards.flavor: "There are no men like me. There's only me."

cards.name: The Tickler
cards.text: Dominance Action: Kneel The Tickler to discard the top card of an opponent's deck. Then, you may choose 1 copy of that card, and discard it from play.
cards.flavor: "Tickler makes them howl so hard they piss themselves." <cite>Chiswyck</cite>

cards.name: Tyrion Lannister
cards.text: Stealth. Reaction: After an [intrigue] challenge is initiated, gain 2 gold. (Limit twice per round.)
cards.flavor: "When you tear out a man's tongue, you are not proving him a liar, you're only telling the world that you fear what he might say."

cards.name: Tywin Lannister
cards.text:
Renown.
Tywin Lannister gets +1 STR for each gold in your gold pool.
+2 Income.

cards.name: Burned Men
cards.text: Ambush (2).
cards.flavor: Every clan in the Mountains of the Moon feared the Burned Men, who mortified their flesh with fire to prove their courage.

cards.name: Gold Cloaks
cards.text: Ambush (2). Forced Interrupt: When a phase ends in which Gold Cloaks entered play using ambush, discard it from play (cannot be saved).

cards.name: Lannisport Moneylender
cards.text:
Limited.
+1 Income.

cards.name: Lannisport Merchant
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Lannisport Merchant to reduce the cost of the next [lannister] character you marshal this phase by 1.

cards.name: The Queen's Assassin
cards.text: Ambush (4). Reaction: After The Queen's Assassin enters play using ambush, choose an opponent. If you have more cards in hand than that player, he or she must choose and kill a character he or she controls.

cards.name: Widow's Wail
cards.text:
Ambush (1).
Attached character gets +2 STR.
If attached character is Joffrey Baratheon, he gains a [military] icon.

cards.name: Casterly Rock
cards.text: You may initiate an additional [intrigue] challenge during the challenges phase.
cards.flavor: "They say there is naught but stone at the heart of Casterly Rock." <cite>Catelyn Stark</cite>

cards.name: Lannisport
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Western Fiefdom
cards.text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Western Fiefdom to reduce the cost of the next [lannister] card you marshal this phase by 1.

cards.name: Hear Me Roar!
cards.text: Action: Put a [lannister] character into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it from play (cannot be saved).

cards.name: The Things I Do For Love
cards.text: Play only if you control a [lannister] Lord or Lady character. Challenges Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a character with printed cost X or lower controlled by an opponent, and return it to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Treachery
cards.text: Play only if you control a unique [lannister] character. Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered character, location, or attachment ability would initiate, cancel those effects.

cards.name: Areo Hotah
cards.text: Ambush (5). Reaction: After Areo Hotah enters play during a challenge, choose a participating character, and remove it from the challenge.
cards.flavor: "Someone told. Someone always tells."

cards.name: Arianne Martell
cards.text: Action: Put a character with printed cost 5 or lower into play from your hand. Then, return Arianne Martell to your hand (cannot be saved). (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Doran Martell
cards.text: Insight. Each other [martell] Lord and Lady character you control gets +1 STR for each plot card in your used pile.
cards.flavor: "Who fears to walk upon the grass? But it is the grass that hides the viper from his enemies and shelters him until he strikes."

cards.name: Edric Dayne
cards.text: Stealth. Action: Pay 1 gold to give Edric Dayne a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

cards.name: Maester Caleotte
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Maester Caleotte is participating, choose a character. That character loses a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

cards.name: Obara Sand
cards.text: Obara Sand may be declared as a defender during [power] challenges in which you are the defending player, even while kneeling.
cards.flavor: "Cersei sent us a head. We should send her back a bag of them."

cards.name: The Red Viper
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which The Red Viper is participating as an attacker, he gains 1 power for every 5 STR by which you won the challenge.
cards.flavor: "Oberyn was ever the viper. Deadly, dangerous, unpredictable. No man dared tread on him." <cite>Doran Martell</cite>

cards.name: Desert Scavenger
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Desert Scavenger to reduce the cost of the next [martell] character you marshal this phase by 1.

cards.name: Dornish Paramour
cards.text: Reaction: After Dornish Paramour is declared as an attacker, choose a character controlled by the defending player. That character must be declared as a defender for this challenge, if able.

cards.name: Greenblood Trader
cards.text: Reaction: After Greenblood Trader enters play, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Add up to 1 of those cards to your hand, and place the others on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.name: House Dayne Knight
cards.flavor: They came astride red horses and golden ones and a few as pale as snow...

cards.name: Palace Spearman
cards.text:
No attachments.
While you are not the first player, Palace Spearman gains an [intrigue] icon.

cards.name: Dawn
cards.text: Attached character gets +1 STR for each plot card in your used pile. While attached character has the House Dayne trait, it gains intimidate.

cards.name: Ghaston Grey
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, kneel and sacrifice Ghaston Grey to return an attacking character to its owner's hand (cannot be saved).

cards.name: Sunspear
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, kneel Sunspear to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 during challenges of this same type until the end of the phase.

cards.name: Blood Orange Grove
cards.text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Blood Orange Grove to reduce the cost of the next [martell] card you marshal this phase by 1.

cards.name: Doran's Game
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge by 5 or more STR, gain X power for your faction. X is the number of plot cards in your used pile. (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
cards.text: Play only if you are not the first player. Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, name a challenge type. Until the end of the phase, the winner of the challenge cannot initiate challenges of that type. (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: Confinement
cards.text: Action: Choose a character with STR 4 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a [military], an [intrigue], and a [power] icon.

cards.name: Benjen Stark
cards.text: Each Ranger character you control cannot be bypassed by stealth. Interrupt: When Benjen Stark is killed, gain 2 power for your faction. Then, shuffle him back into your deck instead of placing him in your dead pile.

cards.name: Ghost
cards.text: No attachments. Stealth. Reaction: After Ghost bypasses a character using stealth, that character cannot be declared as a defender for any challenges until the end of the phase.
cards.flavor: "He's not like the others. He never makes a sound. That's why I named him Ghost." <cite>Jon Snow</cite>

cards.name: Jon Snow
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. While Jon Snow is standing, he is considered to be participating in each challenge in which you control another attacking [thenightswatch] character.
cards.flavor: "Different roads sometimes lead to the same castle."

cards.name: Maester Aemon
cards.text: No attachments. Interrupt: When a [thenightswatch] character would be killed, kneel Master Aemon to save it.
cards.flavor: "Kill the boy, Jon Snow. Winter is almost upon us. Kill the boy and let the man be born."

cards.name: Old Bear Mormont
cards.text: While you control The Wall, Old Bear Mormont does not kneel when declared as a defender. Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you have not lost a challenge as the defending player this phase, put a [thenightswatch] card into play from your hand.
cards.flavor: "The things we love destroy us every time, lad. Remember that."

cards.name: Samwell Tarly
cards.text:
Insight.
+1 Reserve.
cards.flavor: The world was full of cravens who pretended to be heroes; it took a queer sort of courage to admit to cowardice as Samwell Tarly had.

cards.name: Ser Waymar Royce
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Interrupt: When Ser Waymar Royce is killed, discard 1 card at random from each opponent's hand.
cards.flavor: "Do the dead frighten you?"

cards.name: Yoren
cards.text: Reaction: After you marshal Yoren, choose a character with printed cost 3 or lower in an opponent's discard pile, and put it into play under your control.
cards.flavor: "I got thirty this time, men and boys all bound for the Wall…"

cards.name: Messenger Raven
cards.text: No attachments. Dominance Action: Return Messenger Raven to your hand to draw 1 card.

cards.name: Old Forest Hunter
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Action: Discard 1 card from your hand to gain 1 gold. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Ranging Party
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon.
cards.flavor: "We have a long ride before us. Eight days, maybe nine. And night is falling." <cite>Gared of the Night's Watch</cite>

cards.name: Steward at the Wall
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Steward at the Wall to reduce the cost of the next [thenightswatch] character you marshal this phase by 1.
cards.flavor: "We hunt and farm, tend the horses, milk the cows, gather firewood, cook the meals. Who do you think makes your clothing? Who brings up supplies from the south? The stewards." <cite>Chett</cite>

cards.name: Veteran Builder
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Action: Sacrifice Veteran Builder to choose and stand a location.

cards.name: Longclaw
cards.text:
[thenightswatch] character only.
Attached character gets +1 STR and gains renown.
cards.flavor: "I use Longclaw when I must, ser." <cite>Jon Snow</cite>

cards.name: Castle Black
cards.text: Action: Kneel Castle Black to choose and stand a defending [thenightswatch] character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR.

cards.name: The Wall
cards.text: Each [thenightswatch] character you control gets +1 STR. Forced Reaction: After you lose an unopposed challenge, kneel The Wall. Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, kneel The Wall to gain 2 power for your faction.

cards.name: A Meager Contribution
cards.text: Reaction: After an opponent collects income, move 1 gold from that player's gold pool to your own. (Max 1 per round.)
cards.flavor: "The Night's Watch is not proud. We take what is offered." <cite>Old Bear Mormont</cite>

cards.name: Take the Black
cards.text: Dominance Action: Choose a non-unique character with printed cost 6 or lower. Take control of that character. (Max 1 per round.)
cards.flavor: "I pledge my life and honor to the Night's Watch, for this night and all the nights to come." <cite>from the Night's Watch vow</cite>

cards.name: The Sword in the Darkness
cards.text: Play only during a challenge in which you control a participating [thenightswatch] character. Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR as the defending player, the losing opponent cannot initiate challenges against you this round.

cards.name: Arya Stark
cards.text: Stealth. While Arya Stark has a duplicate, she gains a [military] icon. Reaction: After Arya Stark enters play, place the top card of your deck on her facedown as a duplicate.

cards.name: Bran Stark
cards.text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's event would initiate, sacrifice Bran Stark to cancel those effects.
cards.flavor: "Can a man still be brave if he's afraid?"

cards.name: Catelyn Stark
cards.text: While Catelyn Stark is participating in a challenge, your opponents cannot trigger card abilities.
cards.flavor: I take no joy in mead nor meat, and song and laughter have become suspicious strangers to me. I am a creature of grief and dust and bitter longings. There is an empty place within me where my heart was once.

cards.name: Eddard Stark
cards.text: Renown. Reaction: After a challenge is initiated against you, stand Eddard Stark.
cards.flavor: "The winters are hard, but the Starks will endure. We always have."

cards.name: Grey Wind
cards.text: Intimidate. No attachments. Challenges Action: Kneel Grey Wind to choose and kill a character with STR 1 or lower. (STR 2 or lower instead if you control Robb Stark).

cards.name: Robb Stark
cards.text: Renown. Reaction: After a [stark] character you control is sacrificed or killed, stand each character you control. (Limit once per round.)
cards.flavor: "I have won every battle, yet somehow I'm losing the war."

cards.name: Sansa Stark
cards.text: Sansa Stark enters play knelt. Reaction: After Sansa Stark stands, gain 1 power for your faction. (Limit once per round.)
cards.flavor: "Why would you want to ride a smelly old horse and get all sore and sweaty when you could recline on feather pillows and eat cakes with the queen?"

cards.name: Summer
cards.text: No attachments. While you control Bran Stark, he gains insight. Reaction: After Summer enters play, return a [stark] character with printed STR 2 or lower from your discard or dead pile to your hand.

cards.name: Direwolf Pup
cards.text: No attachments. Direwolf Pup gets +1 STR for each other Direwolf card you control.

cards.name: Tumblestone Knight
cards.flavor: Riverrun is situated at the end of the point of land where the Tumblestone flows into the Red Fork of the Trident.

cards.name: Vanguard of the North
cards.text: No attachments. While a player has a War plot revealed, Vanguard of the North does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [military] challenge.

cards.name: Winterfell Steward
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Winterfell Steward to reduce the cost of the next [stark] character you marshal this phase by 1.

cards.name: Ice
cards.text: [stark] character only. Attached character gets +2 STR. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge in which attached character is participating, sacrifice Ice to choose and kill a character controlled by the losing opponent.

cards.name: Gates of Winterfell
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kneel Gates of Winterfell to reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a [stark] card, draw it.

cards.name: The Wolfswood
cards.text: Each Direwolf card in your hand gains ambush (X). X is that card's printed cost.

cards.name: Heart Tree Grove
cards.text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Heart Tree Grove to reduce the cost of the next [stark] card you marshal this phase by 1.

cards.name: For the North!
cards.text: Play only during a [military] challenge. Action: Choose a participating [stark] character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR. If you win the challenge, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Like Warm Rain
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose an [intrigue] challenge as the defending player, kneel a Direwolf character to choose and kill an attacking character. (Max 1 per challenge.)
cards.flavor: His blood felt like warm rain as it sprayed across her face.

cards.name: Winter Is Coming
cards.text: Play only during a challenge. Action: Until the end of the challenge, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1. (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: Daenerys Targaryen
cards.text:
Insight.
While Daenerys Targaryen is standing, each character participating on an opponent's side in a challenge against you gets -1 STR.
cards.flavor: "I am Daenerys Stormborn of House Targaryen, the Unburnt, Mother of Dragons, khaleesi to Drogo's riders, and queen of the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros."

cards.name: Drogon
cards.text: No attachments. Each Stormborn character you control gains renown.

cards.name: Khal Drogo
cards.text:
Renown.
You may initiate an additional [military] challenge during the challenges phase.
cards.flavor: "When Dothraki are defeated in combat, they cut off their braids in disgrace, so the world will know their shame. Khal Drogo has never lost a fight." <cite>Viserys Targaryen</cite>

cards.name: Magister Illyrio
cards.text: Action: Pay 2 gold to choose and stand a character. (Limit once per phase.)
cards.flavor: "Illyrio believes in no cause but Illyrio. Gluttons are greedy men as a rule, and magisters are devious. Illyrio Mopatis is both."

cards.name: Rhaegal
cards.text: No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which a Stormborn character you control is participating, choose and stand a Stormborn character. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Ser Jorah Mormont
cards.text: Renown. If Ser Jorah Mormont has 3 or more betrayal tokens on him, sacrifice him. Forced Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Ser Jorah Mormont is participating, place 1 betrayal token on him.

cards.name: Viserion
cards.text: No attachments. Each Stormborn character you control gains stealth.

cards.name: Viserys Targaryen
cards.text: Interrupt: When Viserys Targaryen leaves play, choose an attachment, and discard it from play.
cards.flavor: "When they write the history of my reign, sweet sister, they will say it began tonight."

cards.name: Braided Warrior
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon.
cards.flavor: Among the Dothraki, the man who does not ride was no man at all, the lowest of the low, without honor or pride.

cards.name: Handmaiden
cards.text: Action: Sacrifice Handmaiden to choose and stand a Lady character.
cards.flavor: Her handmaids had helped her ready herself for the ceremony. Despite the tender mother's stomach that had afflicted her these past two moons, Dany had dined on bowls of half-clotted blood to accustom herself to the taste, and Irri made her chew strips of dried horseflesh until her jaws were aching.

cards.name: Targaryen Loyalist
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Targaryen Loyalist to reduce the cost of the next [targaryen] character you marshal this phase by 1.
cards.flavor: "In holdfasts all across the realm, men lift secret toasts to your health while women sew dragon banners and hide them against the day of your return from across the water." <cite>Illyrio Mopatis</cite>

cards.name: Unsullied
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. While Unsullied is attacking, each defending character gets -1 STR.

cards.name: Drogo's Arakh
cards.text: Dothraki character only. Attached character gets +2 STR. If attached character is Khal Drogo, he does not kneel when declared as an attacker in the first [military] challenge you initiate each round.

cards.name: Plaza of Punishment
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, kneel Plaza of Punishment to choose a character without attachments. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -2 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

cards.name: Dothraki Sea
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, sacrifice Dothraki Sea to put a Dothraki character into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, return it to your hand (cannot be saved).

cards.name: Illyrio's Estate
cards.text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Illyrio's Estate to reduce the cost of the next [targaryen] card you marshal this phase by 1.

cards.name: Dracarys!
cards.text: Action: Kneel a Dragon character or Daenerys Targaryen to choose a participating character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -4 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

cards.name: Fire and Blood
cards.text: Challenges Action: Choose a unique [targaryen] character in your dead pile, and shuffle it back into your deck. If that character is a Hatchling, you may put it into play instead.

cards.name: Waking the Dragon
cards.text: Action: Choose and stand a unique [targaryen] character you control. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, return it to your hand.

cards.name: Left
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. While you control Right, Left gets +1 STR, gains a [power] icon, and does not kneel when declared as a defender.

cards.name: Maester Lomys
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge as the defending player, discard 1 card at random from the attacking player's hand.

cards.name: Margaery Tyrell
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kneel Margaery Tyrell to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +3 STR.
cards.flavor: "I know what a burden you bear. You should let me share the load. There must be some things I could do to help you."

cards.name: Paxter Redwyne
cards.text:
Reduce the cost of the first event you play each round by 1.
+1 Income.

cards.name: Randyll Tarly
cards.text: Renown. Reaction: After Randyll Tarly's STR is increased by a card effect, stand him. (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: Right
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. While you control Left, Right gets +1 STR, gains an [intrigue] icon, and does not kneel when declared as a defender.

cards.name: The Knight of Flowers
cards.text:
Renown.
While The Knight of Flowers is attacking alone, the defending player cannot declare more than 1 character as a defender.

cards.name: The Queen of Thorns
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge in which The Queen of Thorns is participating, put a [tyrell] character with printed cost 6 or lower into play from your hand.
cards.flavor: "All men are fools, if truth be told, but the ones in motley are more amusing than ones with crowns."

cards.name: Courtesan of the Rose
cards.flavor: The war had not touched the fabled bounty of Highgarden.

cards.name: Garden Caretaker
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Garden Caretaker to reduce the cost of the next [tyrell] character you marshal this phase by 1.

cards.name: Olenna's Informant
cards.text: Ambush (4). Reaction: After Olenna's Informant enters play during the challenges phase, name a challenge type. You may initiate an additional challenge of that type this phase.

cards.name: Wardens of the Reach
cards.text: No attachments. Wardens of the Reach gets +1 STR for each The Reach location you control.

cards.name: Heartsbane
cards.text: [tyrell] character only. Action: While attached character is participating in a challenge, kneel Heartsbane to give that character +3 STR until the end of the challenge.

cards.name: Highgarden
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kneel Highgarden and pay 1 gold to choose an attacking character. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge.

cards.name: The Mander
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel The Mander to draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Rose Garden
cards.text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Rose Garden to reduce the cost of the next [tyrell] card you marshal this phase by 1.

cards.name: Growing Strong
cards.text: Challenges Action: Choose up to three [tyrell] characters. Until the end of the phase, each of the chosen characters gets +2 STR.

cards.name: Olenna's Cunning
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] or [power] challenge, the losing opponent names a cardtype (character, location, attachment, or event). Search your deck for a card with a different cardtype, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: "The Bear and the Maiden Fair"
cards.text: Action: Choose a player. Look at the top 5 cards of that player's deck. Place up to 3 of those cards on the bottom of that deck, and the others on top, in any order.
cards.flavor:
And off they went, from here to there,
The bear, the bear, and the maiden fair.

cards.name: Banner of the Stag
cards.text:
You may include non-loyal [baratheon] cards in your deck.
You must include at least 12 [baratheon] cards in your deck.
cards.flavor: "I never asked for Dragonstone. I never wanted it." <cite>Stannis Baratheon</cite>

cards.name: Banner of the Kraken
cards.text:
You may include non-loyal [greyjoy] cards in your deck.
You must include at least 12 [greyjoy] cards in your deck.
cards.flavor: "Greyjoy demands half the kingdom as the price of alliance, but what will he do to earn it?" <cite>Tywin Lannister</cite>

cards.name: Banner of the Lion
cards.text:
You may include non-loyal [lannister] cards in your deck.
You must include at least 12 [lannister] cards in your deck.

cards.name: Banner of the Sun
cards.text:
You may include non-loyal [martell] cards in your deck.
You must include at least 12 [martell] cards in your deck.

cards.name: Banner of the Watch
cards.text:
You may include non-loyal [thenightswatch] cards in your deck.
You must include at least 12 [thenightswatch] cards in your deck.

cards.name: Banner of the Wolf
cards.text:
You may include non-loyal [stark] cards in your deck.
You must include at least 12 [stark] cards in your deck.

cards.name: Banner of the Dragon
cards.text:
You may include non-loyal [targaryen] cards in your deck.
You must include at least 12 [targaryen] cards in your deck.

cards.name: Banner of the Rose
cards.text:
You may include non-loyal [tyrell] cards in your deck.
You must include at least 12 [tyrell] cards in your deck.

cards.name: Master of Whispers
cards.text:
Supported by Master of Ships
Supports: Hand of the King
Rivals: Master of Laws, Master of Coin
You may resolve your [intrigue] claim against any number of opponents of your choice.
+1 STR [intrigue]
cards.flavor: "There are things I might tell you of that eunuch that would chill your blood." <cite>Grand Maester Pycelle</cite>

cards.name: Master of Ships
cards.text:
Supported by Master of Coin
Supports: Master of Whispers
Rivals: Master of Laws, Hand of the King
Raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 during [military] challenges in which you are attacking a rival.
+1 STR [military]
cards.flavor: "He is well suited to the office. He has spent half his life on ships." <cite>Cersei Lannister</cite>

cards.name: Hand of the King
cards.text:
Supported by Master of Whispers.
Supports: Master of Laws.
Rivals: Master of Coin, Master of Ships.
You may initiate an additional [power] challenge during the challenges phase, against a different opponent.
+1 STR [power]
cards.flavor: The Hand of the King was the second-most powerful man in the Seven Kingdoms.

cards.name: Master of Coin
cards.text:
Supported by Master of Laws.
Supports: Master of Ships
Rivals: Hand of the King, Master of Whispers
+2 Income.
cards.flavor: Within three years of his coming to court, he was master of coin and a member of the small council, and today the crown's revenues were ten times what they had been under his beleaguered predecessor… though the crown's debt had grown vast as well.

cards.name: Master of Laws
cards.text:
Supported by Hand of the King
Supports: Master of Coin
Rivals: Master of Whispers, Master of Ships
Increase the number of cards you draw in the draw phase by 1.
+1 Reserve.
cards.flavor: "Stannis is still the rightful heir by all the laws of the Seven Kingdoms." <cite>Ser Davos Seaworth</cite>

cards.name: Crown Regent
cards.text:
Supported by None
Supports: None
Rivals: None
You may redirect 1 challenge this round.
+2 STR for Dominance
cards.flavor: "The Hand serves," the young knight informed him airily. "The regent rules until the king is of age." <cite>Ser Lancel Lannister</cite>
